\nr<Gale>Hello. I'm Gale. I accepted a quest.
\n<Iora>We've been getting complaints about how messy the
guild is. It's been annoying for me to hear, meow.
\n<Iora>That sneaky Ritia keeps slacking off even though the
Guild Master put her in charge of cleaning the guild.
\n<Iora>I'd clean it up myself, but I set up the quest to
send her a message that it's gotten that bad.
\n<Iora>She still hasn't learned her lesson, but maybe you
can show her how much better a clean guildhouse is by
\n<Iora>If not, well, at least this place will be clean
until it piles up again, meow.
\n<Iora>I think I counted 5 piles of wooden scrap and 5
wooden barrels that should be disposed of. Can you go
ahead and deal with them for me?
\nr<Gale>I'll just break them until they're dust!
\n<Iora>Break them? I just wanted you to take them outside,
but I guess that's fine too. Meow!
